content: > the glimmer poncho is now live and so is the golden hour maker along join tl yarn crafts + two of wands for the golden hour make along a 6-week stitching adventure together we ll guide you through creating the ultimate fall layering piece whether you re team hook team needles or a proud member of both learn more here 1 **the glimmer poncho** is where striking texture meets cozy sophistication designed by tl yarn crafts this tunisian crochet poncho brings two-tone flair to chilly days with bold high-contrast striping and plush bell sleeves that move with elegance the shaped neckline frames the collarbone just right while the cropped silhouette offers a modern wearable fit that layers effortlessly over everything from flowy dresses to high-waisted denim perfect for adventurous beginners or confident makers ready to explore tunisian crochet the glimmer poncho introduces approachable techniques in a format that feels fresh and fun using just two colors and a few easy-level stitches it transforms into a lightweight dramatic topper that makes a statement without sacrificing comfort ** free pattern + tutorial video here 2 ** **sizing -** available in sizes xs/s m/l xl/2xl 3xl/4xl **yarn needs -** 6 7 8 9 skeins of a color 22 and 5 6 7 8 skeins of b color 09 in hobbii happy place apricity super bulky weight 6 76yds/ 70m per 1 75oz/ 50g skein note while apricity is categorized as a #6 super bulky weight it has a stitched gauge closer to a #5 bulky weight be sure to swatch first if substituting yarns **tools & notions -** crochet hook 12mm tunisian crochet hook with 32 cord us l-11 / 8mm hook scissors tapestry needle tape measure locking stitch markers adjust hook sizes to meet gauge **gauge -** 11 sts x 11 row = 6 in pattern stitch yarn over is counted as a stitch for gauge and throughout the pattern 1 https //tlycblog com/golden-hour-make-along-october-2025/ 2 https //tlycblog com/glimmer-poncho-tunisian-crochet-cropped-sweater/
